priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Body Irradiation Model Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C160927

self.title: CDISC SEND Body Irradiation Model Response Terminology

definition: Terminology related to the body irradiation model used in the study.
name: Body Irradiation Model Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Body Irradiation Model Response Terminology

terms.definition: A procedure involving irradiation of a specific, limited area of the skin.
A procedure involving irradiation of the whole lung while the heart is covered and protected from radiation exposure.
A procedure involving irradiation of a single lung.
A procedure involving irradiation of the whole body either before or after irradiation at a focal site.
A procedure involving irradiation of the entire abdominal region.
A procedure involving irradiation of the whole body followed by bone marrow transplant.
terms.preferredTerm: Total Body Irradiation Plus Bone Marrow Transplant
terms.submissionValue: TOTAL BODY IRRADIATION PLUS BONE MARROW TRANSPLANT

terms.definition: A procedure involving irradiation of the whole body while a proportion of bone marrow is not irradiated, i.e., shielded or removed from field.
terms.preferredTerm: Total Body Irradiation with Bone Marrow Not Irradiated
terms.submissionValue: TOTAL BODY IRRADIATION WITH BONE MARROW NOT IRRADIATED

terms.definition: A procedure involving irradiation of the whole body.
A procedure involving irradiation of the whole lung.
